column6: House of M tie-in!    All holy heck is breaking loose in not-so-merry-ol' England as Captain Britain and his rag tag squad of misfits must stop the effects of House of M from causing the entire Multiverse to be completely destroyed! And you thought the cuisine was the most dangerous thing in England!
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Rus Wooton
